required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on February 08, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study on Safety and Clinical Efficacy of AZVUDINE in COVID-19 Patients (SARS-CoV-2 Infected)
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Safety and Clinical Efficacy of AZVUDINE in COVID-19 Patients (SARS-CoV-2 Infected): Phase III, Randomized, Double-blind, PLACEBO Controlled Trial

collaborator.agency: GALZU INSTITUTE OF RESEARCH, TEACHING, SCIENCE AND APPLIED TECHNOLOGY, Brazil
SANTA CASA DE MISERICORDIA DE CAMPOS HOSPITAL (SCMCH), Brazil
UNIVERSIDADE ESTADUAL DO NORTE FLUMINENSE (UENF), Brazil

brief_summary.textblock: Estimated number of participants: 342 participants with COVID-19 Design: Phase III, single-center, randomized, double-blind, parallel, placebo-controlled clinical study.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Negative conversion rate of coronavirus viral load on day 7 of treatment compared to baseline
Negative conversion rate of coronavirus viral load on day 14 of treatment compared to baseline

secondary_outcome.description: Time of negative conversion of the viral load of the coronavirus
Negative conversion rate of the coronavirus viral load on days 7, 14 and 28
Time of recovery of body temperature

secondary_outcome.measure: Improvement of respiratory signs and symptoms
secondary_outcome.description: Time for improvement of respiratory signs and symptoms

secondary_outcome.measure: Improvement of diarrhea, myalgia fatigue and other symptoms
secondary_outcome.description: Time for improvement of diarrhea, myalgia fatigue and other symptoms

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in blood oxygen detection rates
secondary_outcome.description: Change in blood oxygen detection rates

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of supplemental oxygenation or non-invasive ventilation
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of supplemental oxygenation or non-invasive ventilation

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency of invasive mechanical ventilation or extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO)
secondary_outcome.description: Frequency of invasive mechanical ventilation or extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO)

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of moderate cases that progressed to severe cases
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of moderate cases that progressed to severe cases

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of severe cases that worsened during treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of severe cases that worsened during treatment

arm_group.description: Experimental: AZVUDINE 1mg tablet, Interventions: AZVUDINE 1mg tablet, 5 tablets QD + standard treatment for up to 14 days
Control: AZVUDINE placebo, Interventions: AZVUDINE placebo, 5 tablets QD + standard treatment for up to 14 days

intervention.description: 5 tablets QD + standard treatment for up to 14 days
5 tablets QD + standard treatment for up to 14 days

facility.name: Santa Casa de Misericórdia de Campos
